name: Obstacles 2.0
description:
This upload of the game features 2 versions! Download Smallstacles if the regular version is too big for your screen. As well download the silent version if you're having trouble with windows security!

For some reason windows keeps thinking that the game file is a virus, I'm working on fixing that but I'm unsure how to do so.

Move with WASD or arrow keys, try to dodge  the red squares!
